titles.title: I'm A New Creation. I'm A Corporate Man

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I'm a new creation. I'm a corporate man.
Old things are passed away; I've been born again.
More than a conqueror; the great I am.
I'm the resurrection; I'm a corporate man.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Hallelujah, He redeemed me.
I am born again to win.
I thank God He justified me.
Of His fullness have we all received of Him.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I received the Christ of Calvary
And I have no sense of sin.
We have a oneness and a fellowship,
Delivered from authority of man.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
God has wrought for me redemption,
One that covers every need.
Perfectly, He's restored our fellowship
With no sense of guilt or memory.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Soy la nueva creacion, el hombre corporal.
Cosas viejas han pasado, renacido estoy.
Mas que vencedor, el gran Yo Soy.
Soy la resurreccion, el hombre corporal.
